verses.verse: Therefore<WG5620>, my<WG3450> brothers<WG80> dearly beloved<WG27> and<WG2532> longed for<WG1973>, my<WG3450> joy<WG5479> and<WG2532> crown<WG4735>, so<WG3779> stand fast<WG4739> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, my dearly beloved<WG27>.
I beg<WG3870> Euodias<WG2136>, and<WG2532> beg<WG3870> Syntyche<WG846>, that they<WG5426> be of the same mind in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.

And<WG2532> I entreat<WG2065> you<WG4571> also<WG2532>, true<WG1103> yokefellow<WG4805>, help<WG4815> those women<WG846> which<WG3748> labored<WG4866> with me<WG3427> in<WG1722> the gospel<WG2098>, with<WG3326> Clement<WG2815> also<WG2532>, and<WG2532> with other<WG3062> my<WG3450> fellow-workers<WG4904>, whose<WG3739> names<WG3686> are in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of life<WG2222>.
Rejoice<WG5463> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> always<WG3842>: and again<WG3825> I say<WG2046>, Rejoice<WG5463>.
Let<WG1097> your<WG5216> moderation<WG1933> be known<WG1097> unto<WG444> all<WG3956> men<WG444>. The Lord<WG2962> is at hand<WG1451>.

Be anxious<WG3309> for nothing<WG3367>; but<WG235> in<WG1722> every thing<WG3956> by prayer<WG4335> and<WG2532> supplication<WG1162> with<WG3326> thanksgiving<WG2169> let<WG1107> your<WG5216> requests<WG155> be made known<WG1107> unto<WG4314> God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> the peace<WG1515> of God<WG2316>, which passes<WG5242> all<WG3956> understanding<WG3563>, shall keep<WG5432> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588> and<WG2532><WG99999> minds<WG3540> through<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>.

Finally<WG3063>, brothers<WG80>, whatever things<WG3745> are<WG2076> true<WG227>, whatever things<WG3745> are honest<WG4586>, whatever things<WG3745> are just<WG1342>, whatever things<WG3745> are pure<WG53>, whatever things<WG3745> are lovely<WG4375>, whatever things<WG3745> are of good report<WG2163>; if<WG1487> there be any<WG5100> virtue<WG703>, and<WG2532> if<WG1487> there be any<WG5100> praise<WG1868>, think on<WG3049> these things<WG5023>.

Those things<WG5023>, which<WG3739> you have<WG3129> both<WG2532> learned<WG3129>, and<WG2532> received<WG3880>, and<WG2532> heard<WG191>, and<WG2532> seen<WG1492> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>, do<WG4238>: and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of peace<WG1515> shall be<WG2071> with<WG3326> you<WG5216>.

But<WG1161> I rejoiced<WG5463> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> greatly<WG3171>, that<WG3754> now<WG2235> at the last<WG4218> your care<WG5426> of<WG5228> me<WG1700> has flourished<WG330> again<WG3739>; where in<WG1909> you were<WG5426> also<WG2532> careful<WG5426>, but<WG1161> you lacked opportunity<WG170>.

Not<WG3756> that<WG3754> I speak<WG3004> in respect of<WG2596> want<WG5304>: for<WG1063> I<WG1473> have learned<WG3129>, in<WG1722> whatever<WG3739> state I am<WG1510>, with it to be<WG1511> content<WG842>.

I know<WG1492> both<WG2532> how<WG1492> to be abased<WG5013>, and<WG2532> I know how<WG1492> to abound<WG1722>: every where<WG3956> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> all things<WG3956> I am instructed<WG3453> both<WG2532> to be full<WG5526> and<WG2532> to be hungry<WG3983>, both<WG2532> to abound<WG4052> and<WG2532> to suffer need<WG5302>.
I can do<WG2480> all things<WG3956> through<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> which<WG3588> strengthens<WG1743> me<WG3165>.
Nevertheless<WG4133> you have<WG4160> well<WG2573> done<WG4160>, that you did share<WG4790> in<WG2347> my<WG3450> affliction<WG2347>.

Now<WG1161> you<WG5210> Philippians<WG5374> know<WG1492> also<WG2532>, that<WG3754> in<WG1722> the beginning<WG746> of the gospel<WG2098>, when<WG3753> I departed<WG1831> from<WG575> Macedonia<WG3109>, no<WG3762> church<WG1577> shared with<WG2841> me<WG3427> as<WG1519> concerning<WG3056> giving<WG1394> and<WG2532> receiving<WG1487>, but<WG3361> you<WG5210> only<WG3441>.
For<WG3754> even<WG2532> in<WG1722> Thessalonica<WG2332> you sent<WG3992><WG99999> once<WG530> and<WG2532> again<WG1364> unto<WG1519> my<WG3427> necessity<WG5532>.
Not<WG3756> because<WG3754> I desire<WG1934> a gift<WG1390>: but<WG235> I desire<WG1934> fruit<WG2590> that may abound<WG4121> to<WG1519> your<WG5216> account<WG3056>.

But<WG1161> I have<WG568> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> abound<WG4052>: I am full<WG4137>, having received<WG1209> of<WG3844> Epaphroditus<WG1891> the things<WG3588> which were sent from<WG3844> you<WG5216>, a odor<WG3744> of a sweet smell<WG2175>, a sacrifice<WG2378> acceptable<WG1184>, wellpleasing<WG2101> to God<WG2316>.

But<WG1161> my<WG3450> God<WG2316> shall supply<WG4137> all<WG3956> your<WG5216> need<WG5532> according to<WG2596> his<WG846> riches<WG4149> in<WG1722> glory<WG1391> by<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>.
Now<WG1161> unto God<WG2316> and<WG2532> our<WG2257> Father<WG3962> be glory<WG1391> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.
Greet<WG782> every<WG3956> saint<WG40> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>. The brothers which are<WG80> with<WG4862> me<WG1698> greet<WG782> you<WG5209>.
All<WG3956> the saints<WG40> greet<WG782> you<WG5209>, chiefly<WG3122><WG99999> they that are<WG3588> of<WG1537> Caesar<WG2541>'s household<WG3614>.
The grace<WG5485> of<WG2962> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you<WG5216> all<WG3956>. Amen<WG1891>. It was written to the Philippians from Rome by Epaphroditus.
